```{r}
data(Puromycin)
View(Puromycin)
library(ggplot2)
 data("Puromycin")
ggplot(Puromycin, aes(x = conc, y = rate, color = state)) +
     geom_point() +
     geom_line(aes(group = state)) +
     labs(title = "Reaction Rate vs Concentration",
        x = "Concentration",
          y = "Rate") +
    theme_minimal()
data(Puromycin)
```
